The coastal pelagic fish catch (lbs.) reported in the commercial fishery. Data comes from DLNR DAR by official data request. Annual catch data is reported to species and region (North West Hawaii (DAR commercial reporting blocks 123, 122, 103, and 102) and South West Hawaii (DAR commercial reporting blocks 121, 120, 101, and 100) from 2012-2017. Raw data available: https://github.com/OHI-Science/whi/blob/master/prep_whi/FIS/FW%253a_fisheries_data_request/ciwhiispecies2012_2017.xls.
